sentences.en: “If inflation heats up, interest rates could increase”(&b{Christian Science Monitor})
sentences.cn: “如果通货膨胀加剧则利率可能会提高”(&b{基督教科学箴言报})

sentences.en: A national poll shows the presidential race in a dead heat.
sentences.cn: 一项全国民意调查显示总统竞选相持不下。

sentences.en: Angela liked to rest during the heat of the day (= the hottest part of the day ).
sentences.cn: 安杰拉喜欢在一天中最热的时段休息一下。

sentences.en: As an asthmatic, he cannot cope with the heat and humidity.
sentences.cn: 他患有哮喘病，经不起高温和潮湿。

sentences.en: Cook the sauce over a low heat until it boils and thickens.
sentences.cn: 以小火加热酱汁至其沸腾变浓。

sentences.en: Despite the heat, he'd swapped his overalls for a suit and tie.
sentences.cn: 尽管很热，他还是脱掉工作服换上了西装和领带。

sentences.en: Firefighters were beaten back by the intense heat.
sentences.cn: 消防队员被高温迫得后退。

sentences.en: Geologists have studied the way that heat flows from the earth.
sentences.cn: 地质学家曾研究过热量如何散出地球。

sentences.en: Grease two sturdy baking sheets and heat the oven to 400 degrees.
sentences.cn: 在两块结实的烤板上抹些油，把烤炉加热到400度。

sentences.en: Heat the milk until it boils.
sentences.cn: 把牛奶煮开。

sentences.en: I was simply staggered by the heat of the Argentinian high-summer.
sentences.cn: 阿根廷盛夏的酷热真让我大吃一惊。

sentences.en: Ice needs heat to melt.
sentences.cn: 冰需要热才能融化。

sentences.en: In an electric power plant the heat converts water into high-pressure steam.
sentences.cn: 在发电厂里，热能将水转化成高压蒸汽。

sentences.en: Insulating the attic is a good way to reduce heat loss.
sentences.cn: 为阁楼安装隔热层是减少热量流失的好方法。

sentences.en: Its leaves drooped a little in the fierce heat of the sun.
sentences.cn: 它的叶子在灼热的阳光下微微耷拉着。

sentences.en: Lower the heat and allow the omelet to set on the bottom.
sentences.cn: 关小火让煎蛋的下面凝固。

sentences.en: Never dry underwear over direct heat; it will weaken the fabric.
sentences.cn: 不要直接加热烘干内衣，那样会损坏布料。

sentences.en: Remove from the heat, add the parsley, toss and serve at once.
sentences.cn: 端离炉子，加上欧芹，颠起翻面后就立刻上桌。

sentences.en: The door was beginning to buckle from the intense heat.
sentences.cn: 门在高温高热下开始变形。

sentences.en: The heat was making them tired.
sentences.cn: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.en: The heat was making them tired. ＃
sentences.cn: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.en: They were all in top hats and cutaways despite the growing heat.
sentences.cn: 虽然天气越来越热，他们仍全部戴着高顶礼帽，穿着燕尾服。

sentences.en: When the fruit is mushy and cooked, remove from the heat.
sentences.cn: 当水果变软煮好后，就从火上端下来。

words.tran_cn: 加热；使兴奋（heat的过去分词）

phrases.phrase: if you can't stand the heat, get out of the kitche
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)怕热，就别呆在厨房里（意指倘若无法应对压力和困难就应让别人去处理，而不是抱怨）

phrases.phrase: in the heat of the moment
phrases.tran_cn: 一时冲动之下；盛怒之下；一时性起
（雌性哺乳动物）在发情期中；发情

trans.tran_cn: 热，高温天气，温度，热源，强烈的感情，压力，预赛
trans.tran_en: warmth or the quality of being hot
to make something become warm or hot
